document_data.name: Nemrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Nemrin''' was one of the noble houses of the [[Lost Kingdoms|Lost Kingdom]] of [[Anauria]].
document_data.Members: House Nemrin was one of three [[human]] families that composed Anauria's nobility, along houses [[Maluradek]] and [[Thardresk]], the later of which encompassed the Anaurian noble family.
document_data.History: During the [[Era of Upheaval]], centuries after Anauria's collapse, some lasting traces House Nemrin could be found amongst the ruins that were scattered across the [[Anauroch]] desert.
